#include <stdio.h>
#include <algorithm>
using std::sort;
int main(){
       int T,teams;
       
       scanf("%d",&T);
       
       while(T--)
       {
         scanf("%d",&teams);
         int points[teams];
         for(int i=0;i<teams;i++)
         {
            scanf("%d",&points[i]);
            points[i] *= 3;
         }
         
         int ties[teams];
         for(int i=0;i<teams;i++)
         {
            scanf("%d",&ties[i]);
            points[i] += ties[i];
         }
         
         sort(points,points+teams);
         
         printf("%d\n",points[teams-1]);
         }
            
         return 0;
         }
